bug.author: madanadit
bug.summary: HA in k8s does not work as expected
bug.description:
Alluxio Version: 2.0.0 Describe the bug After the master pod is restarted on a different host, workers or long-running clients fail to connect the new master. To Reproduce
start master start workers, workers register with master restart master on different node (different ip). note: the master address is specified as alluxio-master which now points to a different ip now workers don't connect to the new master in the user's env and continue to see messages like
<denchmark-code>2019-07-10 22:45:42,284 WARN ChannelAuthenticator - Channel authentication failed. ChannelId: e215b3ed-5662-4416-a1b3-dbde1a0d88f2, AuthType: SIMPLE, Target: alluxio-master:19998, Error: alluxio.exception.status.UnavailableException: io exception </denchmark-code>
Expected behavior Worker register with new master after resolving the service name alluxio-master transparently. Urgency Urgent. No master fault tolerance w/o a resolution. Additional context Our gRPC channel utility attempt to resolve the address only when it's not resolved already. So if the client is stuck with old resolved address, it would supply gRPC with it and we would see this.
